text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Operates bridge station via web browser

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Browser-based user interface for ship bridge stations (helm, weapons, etc.). Runs entirely in browser, no server-side rendering.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Multiplayer game server managing physics simulation at 10 Hz, world state, and player coordination. Distributed architecture (connector + world servers).

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Reusable 2D compass component for ship orientation display. Isolated library with Storybook tests.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Reusable 3D star map component for tactical view. Isolated library with Storybook tests.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Shared domain models (Ship, ObjectInSpace) and geometry utilities. Single source of truth for data structures.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: normal; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
text.tspan: Shared server utilities for Pinus framework (Channel, Session, Router). Server-side only.
